body:
Hello...

This is my 2nd credit giveaway
How to enter:
1. Subscribe to my youtube channel - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCZiLSyR0TYZk9PaO4GC1JSQ
2. Post in this thread, your most favourite avicus moment. 
Winner will be announced on the 8th, 8AM - AEST
body_tagged:

title: [GIVEAWAY] 20k Credits | CONGRATZ SETH

replies.body:
Subscribed :D

There are many favourite moments that I have on Avicus, but one of them that I will remember forever is when I got a total of 1,000 monuments. :P
replies.body_tagged:
Subscribed :D

There are many favourite moments that I have on Avicus, but one of them that I will remember forever is when I got a total of 1,000 monuments. :P

replies.body:
I subscribed! 

My favorite moment was when I was on Justice III and I was in the wool room. I just camped in there getting a bunch of kills. People, including you, were outside trying to kill me they couldn't....I kept shooting them. In the end, my team won and I had 27 kills, 0 deaths. Hopefully, if I win, I can get a badge. (Othe than the astrict) :D
replies.body_tagged:
